QuestData.Title: Into the Crimsonwood
QuestData.Description:
Master Ashton has been taken into the forest. He isn't the only one. Mayor Royston's headcount came up short.
It seems our next steps are clear. We must go into the woods and save Master Ashton.
Marten and I will sneak into the forest and meet you near some ruins further in.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Inquisitor Cleardawn in the Crimson Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: The woods are crawling with witches. We'll have a fight on our hands if we're to save Master Ashton.
